text: Amarna letter EA 369 is a letter written from the pharaoh to Milkilu of Gezer. Some linguistic features of the letter indicate that the scribe also may have been of Gezer origin.S. Izre'el - Language and Culture in the Near East (p.116) Israel Oriental Studies, BRILL, 1995, 279 pages, [Retrieved 2015-07-04] ==References== Category:Amarna letters Category:Egyptian Epigraphs
title: Amarna letter EA 369
